sentences.en: A country bumpkin is someone who is from the countryside.
sentences.cn: 嗯,我是有点听不太懂她说的话;她有一点乡村口音.

sentences.en: Beneath the polished veneer, he is a country bumpkin.
sentences.cn: 尽管有着优雅的外表, 他不过是个乡巴佬.

sentences.en: Frog : Hey , I'm no country bumpkin!
sentences.cn: 嘿, 我不是乡下土包子!

sentences.en: He felt a real country bumpkin, sitting in that expensive restaurant, not knowing which cutlery to use.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己像个土老帽儿, 坐在高级餐厅里, 不知道该用哪一件餐具.

sentences.en: Her criticizers dismiss her as a country bumpkin with rough features only Westerners could appreciate.
sentences.cn: 批评她的人对其不屑一顾,觉得她是个让人不爽的乡巴佬,只有老外才会喜欢.

sentences.en: Yeah , she was definitely a country bumpkin . Were you able to understand her?
sentences.cn: Larry, 你觉不觉得那个在农场工作的女孩和城市女孩很不一样?

sentences.en: You are fashion when everyone think you are fashion, no matter you are bumpkin.
sentences.cn: 当大家都认为你很时尚的时候,你就是时尚的, 那怕你穿的再土.

trans.tran_en: someone from the countryside who is considered to be stupid
